DOC.brief_summary: This multicenter , randomize study . 564 healthy woman , age 18 year old , intrauterine pregnancy , request medical abortion , recruit participate prospective clinical trial . This study provide evaluation oral mifepristone 200 mg vaginal misoprostol 800 mcg administer simultaneously woman 63 day gestation . The aim study compare complete abortion rate , 7 14 day misoprostol administration , use mifepristone 200 mg orally misoprostol 800 mcg vaginally administer simultaneously 24 hour apart woman 63 day gestation . Assessment side effect ( nausea , vomit , pain ) well acceptability do use pre post-study questionnaire , visual analogue scale . Complete abortion rate within 24 hour expect 90 %
DOC.detailed_description: This multicenter , randomize study . 564 healthy woman , age 18 year old , intrauterine pregnancy , request medical abortion , recruit participate prospective clinical trial . This study provide evaluation oral mifepristone 200 mg vaginal misoprostol 800 mcg administer simultaneously woman 63 day gestation . The aim study compare complete abortion rate , 7 14 day misoprostol administration , use mifepristone 200 mg orally misoprostol 800 mcg vaginally administer simultaneously 24 hour apart woman 63 day gestation . Assessment side effect ( nausea , vomit , pain ) well acceptability do use pre post-study questionnaire , visual analogue scale . Complete abortion rate within 24 hour expect 90 % .
DOC.criteria: pregnancy equal le 63 day enrollment abnormal pregnancy diagnose ultrasound
